query.pigql: q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceActivity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate count() / unique('Case_Account_Name')  as 'avg_Activity';

q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceCase_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' >= -10;  q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true"; r = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day'); r = foreach r generate 'CreatedDate_Year'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Month'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month~~~CreatedDate_Day', avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT', "Selected Accounts"  as 'Performance'; s = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day'); s = foreach s generate 'CreatedDate_Year'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Month'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month~~~CreatedDate_Day',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT', "All Accounts" as 'Performance'; u = union s, r; u = filter u by 'Performance' != "ALL";

q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceActivity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";r =  group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day'); r = foreach r generate 'CreatedDate_Year'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Month'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month~~~CreatedDate_Day', count() as 'count',  "Selected Accounts" as 'Performance'; s = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day'); s = foreach s generate 'CreatedDate_Year'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Month'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month~~~CreatedDate_Day', count() / unique('Case_Account_Name') as 'count', "All Accounts" as 'Performance'; u = union r, s; u = filter u by 'Performance' != "ALL";

raw_case.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceCase_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by {{column(filter_toggle.selection, ["IsClosed"]).asEquality("IsClosed")}};  q = foreach q generate 'CaseNumber', first('Account_Name') as 'Account_Name', first('CSAT__c') as 'CSAT__c', first('First_Contact_Close__c') as 'First_Contact_Close__c', first('Type') as 'Type', first('Owner_Name') as 'Owner_Name', first('MilestoneStatus__c') as 'MilestoneStatus__c', first('Origin') as 'Origin', first('Priority') as 'Priority', first('Status') as 'Status', first('Type_of_Support__c') as 'Type_of_Support__c', first('IsEscalated') as 'Escalated', avg('{{column(static_Duration.selection, ["pigql_value"]).asObject()}}') as '{{column(static_Duration.selection, ["measure_field"]).asObject()}}'; q = order q by 'CaseNumber' desc; q = limit q 100;

query.pigql: q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceCaseHistory_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by 'ChangeAfterCloseDate' == "false"; q = filter q by 'Field' == "Status"; averageOld = group q by 'OldValue'; averageOld = foreach averageOld generate 'OldValue' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffOld) as 'Case_Time_Open__c'; averageNew = filter q by 'IsLastChange' == "true"; averageNew = group averageNew by 'NewValue'; averageNew = foreach averageNew generate 'NewValue' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffNew) as 'Case_Time_Open__c'; averageTotal = union averageOld,averageNew; averageTotal = group averageTotal by 'Status'; averageTotal = foreach averageTotal generate 'Status' as 'Status', "All Accounts" as 'Performance', avg('Case_Time_Open__c') as 'avg_Case_Time_Open__c'; averageAccountOld = group q by 'OldValue'; averageAccountOld = foreach averageAccountOld generate 'OldValue' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffOld) as 'Case_Time_Open__c'; averageAccountNew = filter q by 'IsLastChange' == "true"; averageAccountNew = group averageAccountNew by 'NewValue'; averageAccountNew = foreach averageAccountNew generate 'NewValue' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffNew) as 'Case_Time_Open__c'; averageAccountTotal = union averageAccountOld,averageAccountNew; averageAccountTotal = group averageAccountTotal by 'Status'; averageAccountTotal = foreach averageAccountTotal generate 'Status' as 'Status',"Selected Accounts" as 'Performance', avg('Case_Time_Open__c') as 'avg_Case_Time_Open__c'; FinalChart = union averageTotal, averageAccountTotal; FinalChart = filter FinalChart by 'Performance' != "ALL"; FinalChart = order FinalChart by 'avg_Case_Time_Open__c' desc;

q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceCase_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true";  q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate avg('{{column(static_Duration.selection, ["pigql_value"]).asObject()}}') as 'avg_Duration';

q = load "${App.Datasets.ServiceCase_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";  q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true"; r = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day');r = foreach r generate 'CreatedDate_Year'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Month'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month~~~CreatedDate_Day', avg('Time_Open__c') as 'avg_Duration', "Selected Accounts" as 'Performance'; s = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day'); s = foreach s generate 'CreatedDate_Year'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Month'+"~~~"+'CreatedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month~~~CreatedDate_Day',  avg('Time_Open__c') as 'avg_Duration', "All Accounts" as 'Performance'; u = union s, r; u = filter u by 'Performance' != "ALL";

content.displayTemplate: Click on bubble to filter dashboard
